The badges!

Right now the badges are available on SVG & PNG, more to come later. This can also be used for Media purpose.

FOR WHITE BACKGROUND

White badge with fully rounded corners .

A white badge with a huge border radius and a gradient border. This badge will always go on a white background, and its background is always white too. The text is dark blue.

FOR DARK BACKGROUND

Dark Blue badge with fully rounded corners.

A dark blue badge with a huge border radius and a gradient border. This badge will always go on a dark background, and its background is always dark Blue too. The text is white.

FOR WHITE BACKGROUND

Pink Rounded Badge With the WT letters .

A Pink rounded badge and a gradient border with two letter. This badge will always go on a white background, and its background is always white too. The text is dark blue.

FOR DARK BACKGROUND

Blue Rounded Badge With the WT letters .

A dark blue rounded badge and a gradient border with two letter. This badge will always go on a dark background, and its background is always dark blue too. The text is white.

ONLY TEXT

White OR dark blue badges With the.

Simple badges with the full name. This can be achievale using the font Inter with weight bold. The text has to be all togheter.
